job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-24T01:15:03.000Z", "description": "

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to help us build our data automation platform targeted at business users from the ground up using public cloud infrastructure and services. Your position requires hands-on development while collaborating with the team in driving the critical technical decisions and infrastructure needed to launch, support, and ramp the product in a fast-paced environment. You enjoy working closely with product and design to align on requirements and priorities to produce a best-in-class product experience. You have a thinker-doer mentality and can think broadly but deep dive into details and help shape the team culture.


Recommended Skills:


  • Bachelor of Science degree, or equivalent experience with strong coding skills
  • Developed and shipped products using Javascript with frontend (React) and backend (Node.js) frameworks
  • Hands-on experience with using REST APIs, SQL / NoSQL databases, authentication services, web frameworks, and integrating with 3rd party applications.
  • Working Knowledge of cloud platforms, e.g., Azure, GCP or AWS
  • Able to confidently make technology decisions and back them up.
  • Understanding of scripting languages, e.g., JavaScript, Python, Go, PHP, etc.
  • Passion for delivering high-quality software by writing clean code and using test-driven development methodologies; you seek out the root cause when debugging software defects and champion improvements that prevent future issues.
  • Works across teams, have great attention to detail and exhibit excellent written and verbal communication skills.


Benefits

  • MacBook Air/Pro
  • Vision, dental, and medical plan choices
  • Flexible working hours
  • Competitive salary & 401(K)
  • Flexible/Personal Time Off
  • Employee Stock Purchase Plans, and other financial benefits
  • Paid Holidays
